title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. V, pt. 8, ch. 8C, fig. 8C-1 - Composite Drawing of Active Traffic Control Device for Grade Crossings Showing Clearances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. V, pt. 8, ch. 8C, fig. 8C-1 - Composite Drawing of Active Traffic Control Device for Grade Crossings Showing Clearances

State Regulations
INSERT the following text in Figure 8C-1 regarding the

Clearance Above Crown of Roadway: "Note: 19 feet maximum"
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. V, pt. 8, ch. 8C, fig. 8C-1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
